metadata.title: CVE-2021-40633 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A memory leak (out-of-memory) in gif2rgb in util/gif2rgb.c in giflib 5.1.4 allows remote attackers trigger an out of memory exception or denial of service via a gif format file.

notes.note: mdeslaur> no upstream fix available as of 2022-06-22

criterions.comment: giflib package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-06-22').
